scripts.db:push: npm run with:dev -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prod: npm run with:prod -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prod:force: npm run with:prod -- prisma db push --accept-data-loss
scripts.db:reset: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:reset:skip-seed: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate reset --skip-seed
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:deploy: npm run with:prod -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:status: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate status
scripts.migrate:status:prod: npm run with:prod -- prisma migrate status
